text: Kalonga avo kwavija Yesu kakala yamulagize ikinyamkela yamulawe munhu ayo. Miyanza mingi kinyamkela ayo kakala yomkumba munhu ayo. Hamoja wanhu wakala womgodeka mng'anda kuno makono gake na magulu gake gagodekigwa minyololo na mhingu, lakini kakala yokanha, na kinyamkela ayo kakala yomkimbiza mbaka kuluwala.
